BriefInfo.name: Kate Roshchupkina
BriefInfo.brif: I specialize in frontend development. My goal - create accessible and intuitive interfaces.

AboutMe: I am a developer with 10 years of experience in the IT field. During this time, I have come a long way from a business analyst to a Senior BI developer (QlikView и Qlik Sense). I always strive to make cool and customer-oriented products. In 2022, I decided to develop in web development and improved the visualization of reporting for management.

I currently work with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, TypeScript and SCSS. I layout according to the Pixel Perfect concept and use the BEM approach. I can write a simple backend on Node.js, MongoDB and use Postman to debug the project.
Ready to contribute to the creation of quality products for your clients and users.

Projects.title: Application builder microservice – HRSpace
Projects.about: Project for HRSpace (hrspace.hh.ru) Microservice for an application builder for searching for recruiters. The goals of the service: to give customers the opportunity to place an application for selection under three payment models. Recruiters - to respond and correspond with clients within the internal chat, send a resume and register a released employee (date of release and completion of the probationary period).

Projects.title: Portfolio site - kateroshh
Projects.about: The portfolio site kateroshh.ru was created to display information about the frontend developer, display the main projects with their description and the CV (recruiter can download the CV file). The site allows you to switch between Russian and English (this is implemented with the help of Next.js Internationalization, in the first version the data is taken from json files).

Portfolio.title: Frontend developer – Freelance
text: HRSpace project (hrspace.hh.ru) Application builder microservice for recruiter search: forms developed using the Formik library.
achievements: The HRSpace project received first place as the best solution for business

Portfolio.title: BI Developer – Sberbank
text: Perform detailed analysis of source system data and data model in QlikView / Qlik Sense. Data cleaning and validation to source.

Extracting, transforming and loading data from multiple sources (Oracle, Hadoop, PostgreSQL, Excel, csv etc.) using QlikView / Qlik Sense scripting. Designing, developing, testing, publishing, maintaining, and supporting QlikView / Qlik Sense applications (standard objects, Vizlib Qlik Sense extentions).
Using set analysis logic to support business requirements. Managing Qlik Management Consoles including App publishing, tasks schedules. Providing end-user support and problem-solving.
achievements: Developed reports for more than 500 users in QlikView and Qlik Sense
Migrated over 20 QlikView dashboards to Qlik Sense in 2 months

Portfolio.title: Team leader – Sberbank
text: Managed digital team (12 person: BI-developer, data engineer, analytics). Was responsible for the full life cycle of products. Managed the product roadmap with stakeholders and with leadership.

Organized and involved in all agile ceremonies stand-ups, refinements grooming sessions, retrospectives and showcases. Created solution architecture and agreed with other teams. Worked simultaneously with 10 customers.
achievements: Reduced time-to-market for creating dashboards from 30 days to 10 days
Reduced time-to-market for creating data tables from 21 days to 14 days
Received The most customer-oriented team of the division award in 2017
